metadata.synopsis: One-liner father, part of a family trio.Player has entered their family home unbidden (family may otherwise turn up dead - killed by a mind flayer the player failed to stop earlier. Here this is not the case, and the potential victim is oblivious to what might have happened).
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to S_LOW_WindmillMindflayerFollowup_Father - 9eb473a4-6fd9-4cc2-87df-537c434ee32e - (20 39 -7)

0.speaker: Tym Armbrust
0.text: Be on your way or I'll summon the City Watch to deal with you.

1.speaker: Tym Armbrust
1.text: What are you doing here? This is a private home, understand?
